translation.en: [priest] Lord, have mercy on us.
[congregation] Christ, have mercy on us.
[priest] Lord, have mercy on us. Christ, hear us.

translation.en: [congregation] Christ, graciously hear us.
[priest] God, the Father in heaven.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Ghost.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
The Holy Trinity, one God.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
Good night, Joe.
Good night, Father.
Dennis, your minute steak's getting cold.
Confession went late.
Agnes Samson thought about stealing her sister's watch.
translation.ko: 애그니스 샘슨은 동생 시계가 훔치고 싶었대요

translation.en: Took a good ten minutes to convince her that wasn't a sin.
translation.ko: 그게 죄가 아니라고 10분 동안 설득해야 했죠

translation.en: Well, Dennis, this is Father Adeyemi.
Visiting the archdiocese from Nigeria.
My pleasure. Welcome to California.
Ah, thank you.
Eat up, McMurtry.
Miracle on 34th Street is playing at the Westmont.
Will you be joining us, Father McMurtry?
I'll stay in tonight, thanks.
It's been raining pretty hard, and I think I'm coming down with something.
translation.ko: 비가 많이 오는데 감기 기운이 있어서요

translation.en: [man] Suit yourself.
Hello, ladies.
[man] Hi.
Can I help you?
Sorry to bother you.
My car broke down up the road, and it's getting cold out.
translation.ko: 차가 갑자기 고장 났는데 밖이 너무 추워서요

translation.en: I hate to ask, but I wonder if I could use your phone?
translation.ko: 정말 죄송하지만 전화 좀 빌려 써도 될까요?

translation.en: Oh, sure. Please, come in, dry off.
Thank you very much.
The… the telephone is in the parlor if you'd like to call the garage.
Can I make you a cup of coffee?
That'd be nice. Thanks.
[Dennis] Where are you coming from?
All over, I guess.
You're welcome to that, if you're hungry.
I'll eat it later.
Fantastic. Just fantastic, Monsignor.
That was magical.
I'm glad you enjoyed it.
[man] Oh, boy.
I'll put on some coffee, warm us up.
translation.ko: 커피를 끓여 올게요 몸 좀 데웁시다

translation.en: Thank you.
[man] That's probably a new experience.
[man] Yes. She is magnificent.
-Sleep well. -Thank you, Monsignor.
-Glad you enjoyed it. -Good night.
-Good night. -Thanks again, Monsignor.
What's going on?
No! No!
-No! -[grunting]
Hello, Monsignor.
Sister Margaret McGuire,
you remember her?
She was my mother.
You're my dad, Monsignor.
That's…
that's nonsense.
[breathing fast] All right, all right, I knew her.
W… we did things together, but she wanted it.
translation.ko: 그런 적이 있긴 하지만 그 여자도 원했다고

translation.en: She ended up in a whore house.
One of them shot her up with morphine…
translation.ko: 어떤 놈이 모르핀을 주사해서 죽고 말았지

translation.en: -[screams] Please forgive me! -…and it killed her.
translation.ko: 어떤 놈이 모르핀을 주사해서 죽고 말았지 제발 용서해 줘

translation.en: And I got sent to an orphanage.
Look, you've got to understand.
[voice wavering] I'm a sinner.
I've suffered for my sins.
No, no, no, no, no.
Now you're gonna suffer.
translation.ko: 그 죗값은 지금부터 받게 될 거야

translation.en: Here's that map you asked for, ma'am.
Thank you.
[man] May I ask why you're headed to Lucia?
translation.ko: 왜 루시아로 가시는 건지 여쭤봐도 될까요?

translation.en: It seems like a rather personal question, now, doesn't it?
translation.ko: 너무 사적인 부분까지 물어보시는 거 아닌가요?

translation.en: Sorry.
Clearly your tumescence has distracted you, sir.
translation.ko: 음경 팽창 때문에 혼란스러우신 것 같군요

translation.en: I recall asking for today's local paper.
translation.ko: 오늘의 지역 신문을 보고 싶다고 부탁드리지 않았나요?

translation.en: Oh! Sorry.
Here you go.
Yeah, it's big news around here.
Everybody's up in arms.
Fella cuts up a bunch of priests and they ship him up to Lucia?
translation.ko: 신부 여럿을 죽인 놈을 루시아로 보낸다고요?

translation.en: Hey, that's where you're headed.
You're not some sort of journalist or something, are you?
You should bathe more often.
Your fingernails are filthy.
[sighs] What do I owe the pleasure?
I have a reservation.
What's the name?
Ratched. Mildred Ratched.
Vultures, all of them.
San Francisco Chronicle is offering $5,000
translation.ko: '샌프란시스코 크로니클'은 신부 살인마를 처음 찍는 사람한테

translation.en: to whoever gets the first shot of the Clergy Killer.
translation.ko: '샌프란시스코 크로니클'은 신부 살인마를 처음 찍는 사람한테 5,000달러를 준다는군

translation.en: You're not a vulture, are you?
No, ma'am.
I'm a nurse.
Ice machine's at the end in the interior of the breezeway.
translation.ko: 제빙기는 저기 복도 끝 안쪽에 있어

translation.en: We provide that machine as a courtesy,
so I wouldn't abuse that privilege if I were you.
translation.ko: 너무 펑펑 쓰지 않는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: I pay very close attention
to how much ice is in that machine at any given time.
[muttering] God damn it.
May I offer help with the key?
Not much to look at, but we've got a phone in the office.
translation.ko: 방에 별건 없지만 사무실에 전화기는 있어

translation.en: Thank you.
And just so you know, if you happen to have any gentlemen callers,
translation.ko: 그리고 말해 두는데 혹시 남자라도 들였다간

translation.en: I'm going to know about it.
And I do not run a house of ill repute.
Do you understand me?
[Mildred] Hello, I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
It's a pleasure to meet you, sir.
Sir, it is a pleasure to meet you.
I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
[man] Priest killer must die!
I have an appointment. Thank you.
Can I help you?
Hello. I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
I'm sorry, darlin'. He's not talking to press right now.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 자기 지금 기자는 못 만나세요

translation.en: Oh, I'm not the press. I'm the new night shift nurse.
translation.ko: 전 기자가 아니에요 새로 온 야간 근무 간호사죠

translation.en: Dr. Hanover hasn't technically hired me yet,
translation.ko: 정확히 말하면 아직 고용된 건 아니지만

translation.en: but I'm supposed to have a formal interview with him at 11:00,
as this letter clearly states.
[chuckles] Okay, one second. I'm just gonna go get a nurse.
Oh, I'm sorry.
You aren't a nurse?
Me? No.
I'm a nurse trainee.
I admire nurses more than anything.
They really are God's angels.
Yes. Yes, we are.
Okay, be right back.
[man] Hiya.
Have a nice day.
[woman] My preliminary recommendation is this:
that if Mr. Salvatore wants the board to seriously consider a furlough,
translation.ko: 살바토레 씨의 임시 퇴원을 위원회가 진지하게 고려하려면

translation.en: he must continue with Dr. Hanover's regimen of colonics,
translation.ko: 하노버 박사님의 결장 요법을 계속해야 하고

translation.en: he must attend group therapy three times daily,
and he must take his saltpeter tablets as prescribed.
Am I understood?
Si. Si.
[girl] Nurse Bucket?
You're needed at nurse's station one.
Excuse me.
There's a letter.
Where did you get this?
You must be the head nurse.
Mildred Ratched.
I didn't ask what your name was.
Where did you get the letter?
Why, it was sent to me.
That's where I'm confused,
because there is no one in his office except for Dr. Hanover and myself.
translation.ko: 하노버 박사님과 나 외에 사무실에 다른 사람은 없어요

translation.en: I didn't send that.
translation.ko: 난 보낸 적 없고 분명히 말하는데

translation.en: And I can assure you, that isn't Dr. Hanover's signature.
translation.ko: 난 보낸 적 없고 분명히 말하는데 그건 하노버 박사의 서명이 아니에요

translation.en: I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
Dr. Hanover is out of the office till later this afternoon.
translation.ko: 하노버 박사님은 오후 늦게나 오실 겁니다

translation.en: If you'd like to leave a number--
If you don't mind, I'd prefer to wait here.
He'll be gone some time.
You just said he'd return in the afternoon.
It could be longer.
Well, then it could be shorter.
By your own logic.
I truly don't mind waiting.
I have nowhere else to be.
Very well.
-[door opens] -[woman] I'm sorry, Dr. Hanover.
The governor's going to have to reschedule.
Maybe next month.
Another?
No, thank you. Got a long journey back.
…on second thought…
Good afternoon.
Good afternoon, Governor.
I have your booth in the back for you. Right this way.
[Dr. Hanover] Excuse me, Gov. Wilburn.
Dr. Richard Hanover.
-I know who you are. -We had a meeting scheduled today.
You're the guy who runs the loony bin in Lucia.
I prefer the term "psychiatric rehabilitation facility."
We had a similar meeting scheduled last month, and the month before that.
translation.ko: 지난달에도, 그 전 달에도 비슷한 약속을 잡았었죠

translation.en: Maybe we should hear him out.
Tell you what, I'll give you until the moment our drinks are delivered
translation.ko: 이렇게 하지 술이 나올 때까지 시간 줄 테니

translation.en: for you to give me your pitch.
Excuse me, do you mind?
I didn't invite you to sit.
You see, Governor, I don't run a loony bin.
My hospital is a bastion of recovery and rehabilitation unlike any other.
translation.ko: 우리 병원은 치료와 재활의 보루죠 다른 곳과는 달라요

translation.en: Now, as for the funding, I'm currently constructing a barn
translation.ko: 자금 얘기를 하자면 여러 치료 요법에 사용할

translation.en: to be used in various therapeutic regimens.
-And people are-- -And… time's up.
We can maybe meet again in a month or so, or…
translation.ko: 한 달쯤 후에 다시 만나든지 하지

translation.en: Thank you for your time, Governor.
Yeah.
Interesting.
[man] Looking good today, Miss Dolly.
[Dolly] Thanks, Harold.
[chuckles] Whatcha up to?
Just making my rounds.
Excuse me.
Where can I find your restroom?
Down the hall to the left.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Looking good today, Mildred.
[Dr. Hanover] Is there something specific you needed, Nurse Bucket?
translation.ko: 특별한 볼일이 있는 겁니까, 버킷 선생?

translation.en: I'm afraid there's a woman here.
She says she has a job interview with you.
I didn't agree to any such thing.
Get rid of her, please.
I tried, she's very insistent.
I'll take care of it.
You. Are you the one who's here for the interview?
translation.ko: 이봐요, 당신이 면접 보러 왔다는 사람입니까?

translation.en: Yes, an interview that was supposed to start several hours ago.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 몇 시간 전에 시작해야 했던 면접이죠

translation.en: Forgive me, Dr. Hanover, I know your work is very important.
translation.ko: 죄송합니다, 박사님 하시는 일이 중요한 건 알지만

translation.en: But I, too, value my time.
But I suppose if you were willing to conduct the interview right now,
I could try my best to look past the insult.
Your office is this way?
Uh, yeah. Right this way.
I apologize for the mix-up.
If I'm being honest, I don't recall consenting to any sort of an interview.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말하면 면접을 진행하기로 한 기억이 없어요

translation.en: That's quite all right, Doctor.
With a nursing staff as unexceptional as the one you have,
translation.ko: 특출나지 않은 간호진과 함께 일하다 보면

translation.en: certain clerical errors are bound to happen.
translation.ko: 행정적 착오는 얼마든지 발생할 수 있죠

translation.en: Nurse Bucket, a moment, please.
Please, take a seat.
[Mildred] I hope it's not inappropriate, Doctor, to confess something,
but I was a nurse in the Pacific theater during the war.
translation.ko: 전쟁 중에 태평양 전선에서 간호사로 복무했습니다

translation.en: Where exactly were you stationed?
I island-hopped with Admiral Nimitz's boys,
translation.ko: 니미츠 제독 군사들과 이 섬 저 섬 다녔죠

translation.en: from Tarawa, to Saipan, to Okinawa.
You'll see that's where I became familiar with administering anesthetics.
I'm well versed in all the blood derivatives,
translation.ko: 모든 혈액유도체를 잘 다룰 줄 알고

translation.en: oxygen therapy, and, of course, the treatment of shock.
translation.ko: 산소 치료는 물론 충격 치료도 가능합니다

translation.en: Do you have scat throwers here?
Patients who throw their feces?
Oh, yes. In fact, we do.
Well, that won't faze me.
I've encountered many cases of soldiers with battle fatigue,
translation.ko: 전투로 완전히 지쳐버린 병사의 사례를 많이 봤어요

translation.en: who lost their wits entirely.
Men who would try to rape a woman if they could get a hold of her,
translation.ko: 여자에 손이 닿기만 하면 강간하려 덤비고

translation.en: and when they couldn't, would content themselves by throwing excrement…
translation.ko: 실패하면 배설물을 던져 기분을 풀려 들죠

translation.en: ejaculate...
But I was not deterred, Doctor.
In fact, I was invigorated…
because I was a member of the most unsung profession we have in this country.
translation.ko: 이 나라에서 가장 가볍게 잊힌 직업군의 일원이었으니까요

translation.en: We had a saying in the Corps,
"Save one life, and you're a hero."
"Save 100 lives…
[voice wavering] …well, then you're a nurse."
I must say you're a very impressive woman, Miss Ratched.
And clearly passionate.
-But unfortunately-- -May I venture one last query, Doctor?
Do you believe the human mind can be cured?
translation.ko: 인간의 정신을 치유할 수 있다고 믿으세요?

translation.en: I do.
But it's not about belief.
It requires no act of faith.
I've seen it with my own eyes.
I have not.
But I hope you'll believe me when I tell you
it is all I want in the world.
translation.ko: 단 하나의 소원이 있다면 바로 그거예요

translation.en: Miss Ratched, you're…
one of the more interesting women I've had the pleasure of meeting,
translation.ko: 제가 만나 본 여성 중 가장 특별한 분이시군요

translation.en: but I'm sad to say that until I can secure more funding from the state,
translation.ko: 하지만 안타깝게도 주에서 자금 지원을 받지 못하면

translation.en: I simply don't have the resources to bring you on.
I'm sorry.
But when there is an opening, please trust that I will consider you.
translation.ko: 하지만 자리가 생기면 당신을 고려하겠다고 약속하죠

translation.en: Well…
if there's one thing I've learned, Doctor…
translation.ko: 제가 살면서 배운 게 하나 있다면

translation.en: it's that life can be quite unpredictable.
Thank you for your time.
[Nurse Bucket] The sheets were not ironed correctly, the bedpans were a disgrace,
translation.ko: 시트 다림질이 제대로 안 됐어 환자용 변기는 못 봐주겠군

translation.en: and Amelia, too much smiling.
I mean, could we have less teeth and more work?
translation.ko: 그렇게 치아 드러낼 시간에 일을 똑바로 해

translation.en: Thank you all for your help.
And the towels, were they folded by the blind?
[man] Come on.
Hello.
I'm looking for Amelia Emerson.
She's not home, and I'm about to head out on a sales call. Something I can help you with?
translation.ko: 집에 없고, 전 나가는 길인데 무슨 일이시죠?

translation.en: Oh, I'm just an old high school friend passing through town.
Maybe you could give her a message?
What was your name?
Arlene. Arlene Bauer.
[man over radio] The question is, is this an attempt at avoiding the death penalty,
or is Edmund Tolleson really crazy?
translation.ko: 아니면 에드먼드 털리슨이 정말 미친 걸까요?

translation.en: He's being transported from San Quentin Prison
translation.ko: 그는 심리 평가를 위해 산 쿠엔틴 교도소에서

translation.en: for psychiatric evaluation.
Law enforcement is keeping some of the details under wraps,
but word is that one of the victims was almost beheaded.
translation.ko: 피해자 한 명의 목이 거의 잘려 나갔다는 말이 있습니다

translation.en: [man 2] That concludes our special report on the Clergy Killer.
translation.ko: 신부 살인마에 대한 특보는 이만 마치겠습니다

translation.en: -And now… -Do you think you could do me a favor?
This killer gives me the chills, and I'm not talking Bela Lugosi chills.
translation.ko: 이 살인마 놈, 소름 돋네 배우 벨라 루고시랑은 달라

translation.en: Although, I'd sell my soul for a date with him.
translation.ko: 그 사람이랑 데이트할 수 있으면 영혼이라도 팔 거야

translation.en: I'd let him sink his teeth into me and suck me dry
translation.ko: 내 몸에 이빨을 박고 피를 다 빨아도 좋아

translation.en: as if he really were Count Dracula.
If you could just do--
I read all these papers, and none of them describe
translation.ko: - 부탁 하나만... - 신문을 다 읽어봤는데 이 에드먼드라는 놈이

translation.en: what this Edmund fella actually did to those priests.
translation.ko: 신부들한테 무슨 짓을 했는지는 안 나와 있어

translation.en: Now, what favor can I do for you?
If anyone calls asking for Arlene Bauer, could you let me know?
translation.ko: 알린 바워를 찾는 사람이 전화하면 제게 알려주세요

translation.en: It's a little joke between me and an old friend.
translation.ko: 옛 친구가 저한테 항상 치는 장난이거든요

translation.en: And is Arlene Bauer paying for another night's room,
translation.ko: 돈은 알린 바워라는 사람이 낼 건가?

translation.en: or are you two splitting the bill?
A smile like that could melt ice.
So I've been told.
Well, I don't like it.
A lady in my position could go so far as to say you're leering.
translation.ko: 나 같은 숙녀가 보기에는 조금 음흉하시네요

translation.en: A gentleman in my position can't help it
translation.ko: 나 같은 신사는 어쩔 수가 없어요

translation.en: when he's staring at a beautiful woman like yourself.
No, I'm not married.
I've never done this before.
Do you think we could just sit?
Actually, can you sit on that corner?
So what do we do now?
Let's pretend we're husband and wife who've just had a fight.
What was the fight about?
Children.
You want them, but I don't.
translation.ko: 당신은 아이를 원하지만 난 싫은 거예요

translation.en: I believe they're nothing but a burden,
but you believe a family isn't a family without them.
translation.ko: 당신은 아이가 있어야 진정한 가족이라고 생각해요

translation.en: What are you doing?
So when do we make up?
We don't.
You leave.
Why would I leave?
Because…
you'll think you're right,
and I'll think I'm right.
Then we'll both realize it's not going to work.
translation.ko: 이대로는 안 된다는 걸 둘 다 깨닫게 되고

translation.en: And then we'll get a divorce.
Only to find soon after that I'm pregnant.
translation.ko: 하지만 곧 내가 임신한 걸 알게 될 테고

translation.en: And you will convince me to keep it.
translation.ko: 당신은 지우지 말자고 나를 설득할 거예요

translation.en: And then you'll die.
I'll raise it for a few years till I can't do it anymore,
translation.ko: 나는 아이를 몇 년 키우다 더 견디지 못하고

translation.en: and then I will leave her on a doorstep.
translation.ko: 다른 집 문 앞에 아이를 버리겠죠

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't see what the problem is.
When you're ready, you know where to find me.
[groans] Is that all you got?
Arlene Bauer,
you have a phone call.
You should take your coat off.
It's warm in here.
Do you need a drink?
Walter is an excellent bartender.
Look, I don't know what you think you saw.
translation.ko: 이봐요, 당신이 뭘 봤다고 생각하는지 모르지만...

translation.en: Oh, I know what I saw.
translation.ko: 나는 내가 뭘 봤는지 아주 잘 알아

translation.en: What is it you want?
Your job.
And since there aren't any positions available,
I have been forced to create one myself.
What makes you think my husband will believe you?
translation.ko: 내 남편이 당신 말을 믿을 것 같아요?

translation.en: And what am I supposed to tell him?
Tell him this town is poison…
and that you want to get as far away from it as possible.
For your daughter.
[woman] How would you feel about your hospital
being the cornerstone of the governor's reelection campaign?
translation.ko: 재선 운동의 초석이 될 수 있다면 어떨 것 같아요?

translation.en: What is there to say? I'm… [chuckles]
I'm speechless.
Your facility,
your bold new ideas,
their proven results,
this will force voters to see the governor in a whole new light.
translation.ko: 이게 있으면 유권자들은 주지사님을 새롭게 볼 거예요

translation.en: Not as a musty old bureaucrat, but as a forward-thinking progressive.
translation.ko: 쉰내 나는 관료가 아니라 진취적이고 진보적인 인물

translation.en: A leader who can rehabilitate a lost segment of the state workforce
and move them back into the economy.
I believe this will swing momentum back to us…
translation.ko: 나는 이번 일로 우리 일에 다시 힘이 실리고

translation.en: and the governor into his reelection.
So, Doctor.
What do you say?
[Nurse Bucket] I can't believe it, sir.
Our hospital. I mean, your hospital…
…finally getting the recognition it deserves.
This is everything we've ever wanted.
We have work to do.
Nowhere do I want anything greater than a ten-to-one patient-to-staff ratio.
translation.ko: 직원 한 명당 환자 비율이 1대 10을 넘지 않게 하세요

translation.en: -Is that clear? -That could be difficult, sir.
Why is that difficult, Nurse Bucket?
Well, sir, it's Amelia. She hasn't shown up yet.
translation.ko: 그게 어밀리아 때문이에요 아직 안 왔습니다

translation.en: What about Jackie?
She's on vacation in Monterey.
And who approved that? You, I imagine.
Mm, Dr. Hanover, service came for you.
Phone call. A Dr. Richard Hanover.
This is a big day for all of us.
Doctors, nurses, and low-level attendants.
It is imperative that we live up to the expectations
that attracted Gov. Wilburn's attention.
It is our moment to prove why this hospital is so special.
translation.ko: 이 병원이 왜 특별한지 증명할 기회입니다

translation.en: What are you doing here?
[Mildred] Me?
I'm… I'm just here to help.
Every square inch of this facility needs to be spotless.
translation.ko: 이 시설은 구석구석 윤이 나야 합니다

translation.en: Every surface, I should be able to eat runny eggs off of it.
translation.ko: 바닥에 떨어진 반숙 계란을 주워 먹어도 될 정도로

translation.en: [man screaming] No!
[Nurse Bucket] Unruly patients need to be humanely tamed…
and tranquil.
And you must all perform your duties
in the utmost professional manner possible.
Do I make myself clear?
-[overlapping chatter] -Absolutely. Thank you so much.
translation.ko: - 네, 버킷 선생님 - 물론이죠, 벳시, 고맙습니다

translation.en: Good. Now let's get to it.
-[people shouting] -[man] Governor!
[man] Mio fratello… [sobbing] Mio fratello…
voglio stare con te.
The new barn will become the heartbeat of Lucia,
translation.ko: 새 헛간은 우리 병원의 새 심장이 될 겁니다

translation.en: using all the latest advances in assisted therapy
to calm even the most troubled mind
before we even begin administering a single medication.
translation.ko: 가장 심각한 환자도 안정시킬 수 있을 겁니다

translation.en: That's marvelous. That's wonderful! Do you hear that, guys?
[man] Yes, sir.
-Please, no. -[camera flash clicks]
-I do not wish to be photographed. -What about Edmund Tolleson?
translation.ko: 부탁드립니다 사진은 찍지 말아 주세요 에드먼드 털리슨은요?

translation.en: What precautions have you taken
to ensure your patients' and staff's safety when he arrives?
translation.ko: 환자와 직원의 안전을 어떻게 보장할 생각입니까?

translation.en: -Where are you gonna chain him up? -All right, come on.
Well, we don't chain anyone up.
He's a human being.
But as for the logistical problems of housing Mr. Tolleson,
translation.ko: 하지만 털리슨 씨의 거처 문제를 해결하기 위해

translation.en: we found a solution that's both canny and budget-conscious.
As you may know, this facility was formerly a rest spa.
translation.ko: 여러분도 아시다시피 이곳은 원래 스파 휴양지였죠

translation.en: It actually has a wine cellar deep underground.
translation.ko: 그래서 지하 깊은 곳에 와인 저장고가 있습니다

translation.en: We've transformed that space into a maximum-security holding area
where Edmund will be housed until he is evaluated.
translation.ko: 심리 평가가 끝날 때까지 거처를 제공할 겁니다

translation.en: A wine cellar. Are you kidding me?
Come on now.
Edmund Tolleson is not the story I brought you here to cover.
translation.ko: 에드먼드 털리슨 기사를 쓰라고 여기 데려온 게 아니야

translation.en: It certainly isn't the one you're going to run!
[Nurse Bucket] Dr. Hanover!
It's Father Murphy.
Get me a blanket. We need to make sure he stays warm.
-What's going on? -He collapsed.
What are you doing?
Don't touch him!
Don't you ever lay a hand on me!
How dare you!
Just wait for it!
There, there. Keep breathing, keep breathing.
Stay with us, Father.
His blood pressure was dangerously low.
The shock nearly killed him.
Did you say shock?
I think someone gave him the wrong medication.
translation.ko: 누군가가 약을 잘못 준 것 같아요

translation.en: [Wilburn] Hey there, Mister. Gov. Wilburn, how about a picture with me?
translation.ko: 안녕하신가 윌번 주지사일세 사진 한 장 찍지?

translation.en: -Come on. Let's go. -Look this way, please.
Look into the camera, there you go. Big smile!
What's wrong with him?
They just told him that his brother passed away, poor thing.
translation.ko: 동생이 죽었다는 얘기를 방금 들었거든요, 불쌍하게도

translation.en: Not that it would have mattered.
He didn't know, but he wasn't getting furloughed anyway.
translation.ko: 환자는 몰랐는데 어차피 안 내보내 줄 거였어요

translation.en: His nephew called, said they didn't want him let out.
[Wilburn] Look here.
[man] Look up and smile.
Miss Ratched, would you come with me, please?
translation.ko: 래치드 씨 잠깐 나 좀 볼까요?

translation.en: Doctor. The governor would like a word--
How is the patient? Did he pull through?
Y-- yes.
Fantastic. Look, I told the reporters and the photographers to go upstairs.
You'll be on one side of the bed,
I'll be on the other, handing you the check for $75,000.
translation.ko: 내가 반대편에서 자네한테 75,000달러 수표를 주는 거야

translation.en: -The patient will be in the middle. -Wha--
I don't understand.
Doctor, a dozen reporters just saw a member of your staff save a man's life.
translation.ko: 박사님, 이 병원 직원이 기자들 앞에서 사람을 구했어요

translation.en: Let's not discourage them from putting that in the story,
translation.ko: 이 기사를 꼭 실을 수 있게 해야죠

translation.en: and let's make sure they have a photo to go with that story.
I told you, I don't do photographs.
-We have-- -You're fine.
She's the one that saved his life. I choose her.
translation.ko: 살린 건 저 여자니까 저 여자로 하지

translation.en: All right, gentlemen, one more shot and we're done.
translation.ko: 좋습니다, 기자님들 한 장만 더 찍죠

translation.en: Great. Let's get one with the two of us. Huh?
translation.ko: 그러면 우리 둘이 한 장 찍지

translation.en: Please don't put your hand on me like that.
translation.ko: 제 몸에 그렇게 손대지 말아 주세요

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, I guess she works here now.
translation.ko: 이제 정식 직원이 된 것 같네요

translation.en: [Mildred] Hello, Mr. Salvatore.
I'm sorry about your brother.
I know how you feel right now,
not being able to be with him.
Told that you're mad…
when that's what's driving you mad.
translation.ko: 그런 말들 때문에 제일 미칠 것 같겠죠

translation.en: Isn't it?
I know how that feels.
I had a brother.
He was the only family I ever had.
Well, the only family I ever knew, anyway.
translation.ko: 최소한 기억 속의 가족은 동생 하나예요

translation.en: I remember my mother and father, but I can't picture them.
translation.ko: 어머니와 아버지도 기억나지만 머릿속에 그려지진 않아요

translation.en: All I remember is a…
a feeling.
You see, I was taken away from them when I was very young…
translation.ko: 아주 어렸을 때 부모님과 헤어져야 했죠

translation.en: and told that someday I would see them again.
That they would come for me.
But that was a lie.
They never did.
And so all I had was my brother.
And then he was taken away from me too.
And he needed me.
He really needed me…
and I was helpless.
There was nothing I could do to protect him anymore.
translation.ko: 그 애를 지키기 위해 더 할 수 있는 일이 없었죠

translation.en: Right now, there's something difficult I have to tell you.
translation.ko: 지금 조금 힘든 이야기를 해야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: The doctors and nurses here,
they want to give you hope…
that one day you can leave here and see your family again.
translation.ko: 언젠가 여길 나가서 가족을 만날 수 있다고 하지만

translation.en: But you deserve someone to show you mercy, Mr. Salvatore,
and so I have to tell you
translation.ko: 내가 말해 줘야 할 것 같군요

translation.en: that I know for a fact that they are never going to let that happen.
translation.ko: 그런 일은 절대 일어나지 않을 거예요

translation.en: You are going to spend the rest of your life in here…
because your family doesn't ever want to see you again.
translation.ko: 당신 가족은 당신을 보고 싶어 하지 않으니까

translation.en: [in wavering voice] It's something I wish someone had told me when I was young…
translation.ko: 내가 어렸을 때 누가 그렇게 말해줬다면 좋았을 텐데

translation.en: so I could stop believing otherwise.
translation.ko: 그러면 헛된 희망을 품지 않았을 테니까요

translation.en: [softly] How different I would be if someone had.
translation.ko: 그랬다면 나도 다른 사람이 됐을 텐데

translation.en: But I have to tell you,
you have been subjected to enough pain.
You deserve to be free from it.
I am only gonna tell you this once…
but there is a letter opener on Dr. Hanover's desk.
I can take you there right now.
translation.ko: 지금 거기로 데려가 줄 수 있어요

translation.en: Would you like that?
-Si. -[camera flashes click]
Fellow Californians.
Hello, Jerry.
Glad you could make it.
Miss Ratched.
Do you take me for an idiot?
Nurse Bucket informed me
that Father Murphy suffered cardiogenic shock.
That's right.
Strange that the seal is freshly broken,
translation.ko: 이상하지 않습니까? 최근에 병을 딴 것 같군요

translation.en: considering none of our patients are on this medication.
translation.ko: 우리 환자 중에는 이 약을 먹는 사람이 없는데

translation.en: Of course it would be dangerous
for somebody with Father Murphy's condition to take these.
Wouldn't you say?
Yes.
I honestly don't know what you're asking me, Doctor.
translation.ko: 무슨 말씀을 하고 싶으신지 잘 모르겠네요, 박사님

translation.en: Is there somebody in my office?
Dr. Hanover, are you feeling all right?
[breathing fast] Oh, God.
I don't…
How'd he get in here?
Clearly, he wasn't being supervised closely enough.
translation.ko: 아무래도 관리 인력의 주의가 부족했던 것 같군요

translation.en: God damn that Bucket!
-Dr. Hanover. -What am I going to do?
The press is here.
Dr. Hanover.
You are in a state of shock right now.
What has happened here is a tragedy, yes.
translation.ko: 이곳에서 일어난 일은 비극적인 일인 건 맞아요

translation.en: All my work. Everything, everything I'm fighting for…
translation.ko: 제기랄, 내 모든 노력이 물거품이 됐어

translation.en: I'll be exposed.
-This-- this negligence will ruin me! -Dr. Hanover.
translation.ko: 전부 들통날 거야 - 관리 소홀로 망할 거라고 - 하노버 박사님

translation.en: -Will ruin me! -Dr. Hanover, you must stop!
I will take care of this.
You stand up tall and proud, you walk out of this room,
face the governor, and you be quick about it. He's waiting.
translation.ko: 주지사님을 마주하셔야 해요 빨리요, 기다리고 계세요

translation.en: Yes.
Thank you. Thank you.
And Dr. Hanover.
When you have a moment with the governor after his speech,
you tell him you've offered me a position here.
He will be pleased.
Yes. Yes, of course.
He'll be pleased.
[Wilburn] I am a child of California.
translation.ko: 저는 캘리포니아의 아들입니다 이곳에서 태어났다고 말할 수 있어 자랑스럽습니다

translation.en: I'm proud to count myself amongst her native sons.
translation.ko: 이곳에서 태어났다고 말할 수 있어 자랑스럽습니다

translation.en: I was raised on the promise of this great state.
translation.ko: 저는 위대한 캘리포니아의 가능성과 함께 자랐습니다

translation.en: [Nurse Bucket] What exactly are you doing in there?
Hello, Nurse Bucket.
Dr. Hanover asked me to wash the towels in his private bathroom.
translation.ko: 하노버 박사님이 개인 화장실의 수건 세탁을 부탁하셔서요

translation.en: He asked you to wash his towels together with the linen from the patients' rooms?
translation.ko: 박사님 수건을 환자 이불과 같이 세탁하라고 하셨다고?

translation.en: Maybe you haven't been listening to his lectures,
but Dr. Hanover believes all human beings are equal.
translation.ko: 박사님은 모든 인간이 평등하다고 믿는 분이시죠

translation.en: [Wilburn] I believe in the dreams of California,
dreams shared by every restless soul
translation.ko: 이 땅을 찾아 서쪽으로 모험을 떠난

translation.en: who pulled up stakes and journeyed west to discover this land.
translation.ko: 이 땅을 찾아 서쪽으로 모험을 떠난 용감한 영혼들의 그 꿈을 믿습니다

translation.en: A place where our tomorrows are better than our yesterdays,
and where we do not shrink from the responsibility that is our fellow man!
translation.ko: 이웃이라는 우리의 책임으로부터 도망치지 않는 곳이죠

translation.en: I promise you…
that we shall win together!
Hanover, it's been a pleasure.
Exceeded expectations.
Thank you, sir. We'll be in touch.
Yes.
And that nurse…
Ratched.
Tell her I said goodbye.
There's not a lot of meat on her bones, but what's there is choice.
translation.ko: 뼈에 고기가 별로 안 붙어 있지만 품질은 최고더군

translation.en: [man] Let's go!
[man] Edmund Tolleson, you're to be held at Lucia State Mental Hospital
translation.ko: 에드먼드 털리슨 당신은 루시아 주립 정신 병원에

translation.en: for a period of 120 days,
or until Dr. Richard Hanover can make the accurate recommendation
translation.ko: 혹은 리처드 하노버 박사가 당신이 재판에 설 수 있는지

translation.en: regarding your fitness to stand trial.
translation.ko: 정확한 판단을 내릴 때까지 수감될 것이다

translation.en: During this time, you are still a prisoner of the state of California,
translation.ko: 이 기간에도 당신은 캘리포니아주의 죄수 신분이며

translation.en: and will be treated as such.
Edmund Tolleson?
Is that you?
It's me. [gasps]
I found you.
I finally found you.
I don't wanna die.
You're not going to die, Edmund.
I promise.
